short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with any website, get answers instantly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navigate the web smarter than ever before. With AskWebsite extension, you can now engage in a conversational experience directly within any website you visit. Simply activate the extension and start asking questions based on the siteâ€™s content. Transform your browsing experience from passive reading to active questioning, making the web more interactive and insightful for you. Dive in and let your curiosity lead the way!

**Instant Interaction**
With AskWebsite, engage in real-time chat with any website you visit. Our Chrome Extension analyzes the website's content and provides you with instant, accurate answers to your queries, making your browsing more interactive and engaging.

**Personalized Navigation**
Gone are the days of mindless scrolling and searching. AskWebsite enables you to find the information you need in an instant by simply asking. Our intelligent system navigates the page content on your behalf, saving you time and energy.

**In-depth Understanding**
AskWebsite isn't just about finding information quickly, it's about understanding it. Our extension provides detailed explanations using the website's content, enabling you to grasp even complex information with ease.

**Multilingual Support**
Explore the web without language barriers. AskWebsite supports multiple languages, allowing you to communicate with websites in your preferred language. With our extension, the world wide web is truly worldwide.

**User-Friendly Design**
Enjoy an intuitive and user-friendly interface designed for all levels of tech savviness. AskWebsite offers a seamless and straightforward user experience, making web browsing enjoyable and efficient.
